sub_title: Civil Lead Engineer Downstream Projects - Shell Global Solutions
summary:
Lead Discipline Engineer with over 29 years Civil, Structural and Offshore engineering and construction experience gained in various locations across the world, i.e. The Netherlands, Singapore, Russia, USA, UK.

Technical Authority level 2 in civil & structural engineering, 23 years in the oil & gas industry of which 12 years on Shell projects both as EPC contractor and Owner staff. 

Lead engineer with wide-ranging engineering and construction experience in civil, structural (stick-built and modular) design and execution of both onshore and offshore projects including Downstream (e.g. ethylene cracker), New Energy (Biofuels and Hydrogen) and (F)LNG.

Solid technical and project execution knowledge for all project phases. Able to connect with experts in and outside Shell organization. Successfully uses the expert network to building trust on new innovative ideas and or resolutions to technical issues with both the asset owners and the regulators.

Well-developed safety, quality and project control skills on oil & gas projects in Shell and outside Shell in an EPC organization with an excellent track record of delivery of value to projects. 

Solid experience of bidding and tendering process including preparation of technical scopes of work and subsequent (sub) contractor management. Actively involved in constructability, modularization, logistics & infrastructure concepts and studies. 

Subject matter expert in civil structures (concrete and steel) including onshore modules and very strong academic base (holder of two Master of Science degrees in Structural Engineering and Mechanics) with relevant expertise in structural concrete engineering and materials and advanced (topsides) structural analysis including non-linear, dynamic finite element analyses e.g. seismic, fire & explosion. 

Experienced in applying Best Practices to civil/structural troubleshooting, engineering, and construction.

Strong team player with demonstrated leadership skills, managing with mutual respect an international team of engineers with different backgrounds and cultures in a multi-location execution environment. Strong drive for cost, schedule, and execution efficiency, consistently seeking the balance between replication and improvement opportunities as appropriate and pushing the boundaries and working towards point “C”. Natural aptitude for stakeholder engagement.

Strong drive for efficient execution. Suggested new and innovative ideas. Led in Shell key technical work in the field of High-Performance Concrete (HPC) during Development, Demonstrate, and Deployment phases.

school.name: Technical University Of Civil Engineering Bucharest

profile_positions.title: Civil Lead Engineer Downstream Projects – EMEA
